title: Tell me again the IFS works
body:
https://i.imgur.com/ZYewESI.png

Edit: Read the chat log I put at the top, I'm not talking about this guy's scores.

replies.body: who said it worked to begin with?

> [{quoted}](name=Inkling Commando,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-02-27T09:03:06.970+0000)
>
> who said it worked to begin with?

I can't name them but I'm sure most of us know who I'm talking about

Submit a ticket and request a manual review or ask a Rioter on Twitter. 
Do not rely on the report system to punish inters or afkers in your games.
Report system only works on people who "type".

Edit: But in your case in that one game you played. It'll add up when they keep typing. They possibly didn't type enough for the system to catch them.

> [{quoted}](name=Ryvalos,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-02-27T07:20:27.123+0000)
>
> Submit a ticket and request a manual review or ask a Rioter on Twitter. 
> Do not rely on the report system to punish inters or afkers in your games.
> Report system only works on people who "type".

Did you look at what I posted or...
> 
> Edit: But in your case in that one game you played. It'll add up when they keep typing. They possibly didn't type enough for the system to catch them.

If you "kill yourself" messages isn't enough, then clearly the IFS doesn't work.

They only said neck yourself. Not sure if they typed more during game or just end game lobby. 
No it isn't enough to punish them there on the spot. It has to get enough keywords over the amount of games they played. 

Think of it like poison that damages overtime. They'll eventually faint.

> [{quoted}](name=Ryvalos,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2020-02-27T07:28:37.221+0000)
>
> They only said neck yourself. Not sure if they typed more during game or just end game lobby. 
> No it isn't enough to punish them there on the spot. It has to get enough keywords over the amount of games they played. 
> 
> Think of it like poison that damages overtime. They'll eventually faint.

Except it's supposedly a zero tolerance phrase

Zero tolerance to manually reviewing it.

Come on. Don't expect the lazy developers that created the bot algorithm that detects key phrases to instant punish a player. Unless they said it several times in one game like a previous experience I had. 
You can downvote me all you want. It doesn't matter to me. xD Points mean nothing. =D

I know the system well enough already.

> [{quoted}](name=Ryvalos,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2020-02-27T08:29:46.820+0000)
>
> Zero tolerance to manually reviewing it.
> 
> Come on. Don't expect the lazy developers that created the bot algorithm that detects key phrases to instant punish a player. Unless they said it several times in one game like a previous experience I had. 
> You can downvote me all you want. It doesn't matter to me. xD Points mean nothing. =D
> 
> I know the system well enough already.

I haven't downvoted you though, idk if you have BEK or not but you can see how many up/down votes you get

> [{quoted}](name=Ryvalos,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2020-02-27T07:28:37.221+0000)
>
> It has to get enough keywords over the amount of games they played.

Doesn't seem to be the case from my experience. I never had any past punishments and I do not flame, not even in "self-defence" or whatever else the "how did i get banned????" posts typically claim. I just decided to drop one obvious keyword a single time and it was an instant 14-day ban.

I got people who told me to 'kill myself' or they 'hope my mother dies irl' and I reported, wrote in the report box AND submitted a ticket. 

They are still playing just fine.

I try to curb my criticism of Riot but their ban system is a joke 100%
Didn't some people say it takes 3 instances of ZT phrases to be punished?

Whoever said that was talking out of their ass, the devs have never commented to the public of any specific operations of the system, everything has been vague at best.

Edit: not counting progressing punishment tiers.
You should search "Tantram hold my beer" on Google and read up what that one user tested.

After a few minutes of seeking Tantrum's hold my beer, I found a case where he unbanned people who were coerced into using some weird ZT phrases, and perma'd the coercers. Didn't spot him declaring any specifics of the system's operation or player testing.

I'll belive you though, but what would you say is from that case I didn't find? I think you've been pretty well informed based on all I remember seeing you say.

Would be nice to see someone important to the system itself paying attention here though. I wonder if there's anyone still doing any editing outside of list updates.

Oh it wasn't  Tantram that said it, it was the player who said they tested the system to bait ban others, and he found that 3 ZT phrases = punishment.

Hardly anything official,  but many times it does seem like 1 ZT phrase is not enough to get a punishment.

That just might be true. Then it should be TT: Two Tolerance. Or maybe DT, Di-Tolerance. BT, maybe, Bi-tolerance? Hah, just kidding. Going to have to pay careful attention to those 'I did a ZT thing' threads like [this one](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/zEjKLmaH-riottyphon-banned-me-after-i-was-told-to-kill-myself).
Was this in-game chat, lobby chat or private chat?

> [{quoted}](name=Aneirin,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2020-02-27T23:09:28.077+0000)
>
> Was this in-game chat, lobby chat or private chat?

post game lobby
the IFS works

> [{quoted}](name=CharDeeMcDenniz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2020-02-27T13:55:31.459+0000)
>
> the IFS works

How dare you lie to me? I thought we were friends

> [{quoted}](name=General Esdeath ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2020-02-27T22:49:42.042+0000)
>
>  I thought we were friends

first mistake

> [{quoted}](name=CharDeeMcDenniz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2020-02-28T00:45:17.805+0000)
>
> first mistake

smh my head

"shake my head my head"

?

> [{quoted}](name=CharDeeMcDenniz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2020-02-28T12:31:33.170+0000)
>
> "shake my head my head"
> 
> ?

that's what I'm saying
toxicty not detected ,troll grief not detected ,what's the point others been punished then with permanent bans? , unfair all!.

> [{quoted}](name=RayleighTT,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2020-02-27T18:42:09.668+0000)
>
> toxicty not detected [...] 

I don't know but they were pretty good at detecting your toxicity in the past :)
Ah, the ol' "If it doesn't do it right 100% of the time, it doesn't work at all" horseshit.
If it can't identify "end ur pathetic fucking life" then it really is horseshit.

> [{quoted}](name=GatekeeperTDS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2020-02-27T11:24:28.304+0000)
>
> Ah, the ol' "If it doesn't do it right 100% of the time, it doesn't work at all" horseshit.

If a scan bot can't scan, it doesn't work.
The IFS works. Unless you consider flaws to mean something doesn't work. I mean, my toothbrush works, but an electric one works even better.

> [{quoted}](name=Tele II,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2020-02-27T22:50:59.207+0000)
>
> The IFS works. Unless you consider flaws to mean something doesn't work. I mean, my toothbrush works, but an electric one works even better.

When your program is to scan words, and it fails to pick up words you've set it to respond to, it doesn't work.

> [{quoted}](name=General Esdeath ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBMawHjF,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-02-27T06:40:19.087+0000)
>
> https://i.imgur.com/ZYewESI.png
> 
> Edit: Read the chat log I put at the top, I'm not talking about this guy's scores.

I'm already aware of this. It doesn't _always_ work and sometimes even tickets don't help because they won't really do anything about it with actual 'kys' or racist slur screenshots. But I don't bother pointing it out anymore! Its none of my business anyways whether it works or doesn't.
